item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Today is my first day as an independent consultant. For the last 4 years I worked on Semaphore, a continuous integration service used daily by thousands of developers around the world.

Now, I decided to join my wife Tanja and to find a niche where we can make a difference. We're still working on that. Until then, I'll work as an independent consultant.

I plan to use this page as the log of my weekly activities. I'm still not sure if this is a good idea - to make this page public, but I'll still try it out.
item.author: Nebojša Stričević
